fee_codes.description: minor nerve - including digital, cutaneous or lateral femoral cutaneous nerve
major nerve - excluding carpal tunnel or ulnar nerve at elbow
Decompression, exploration for thoracic outlet syndrome including excision of cervical and/or first rib and to include scalenotomy
Brachial plexus (excluding thoracic outlet syndrome or cervical rib)
Exploration and/or decompression and/or neurolysis of ulnar nerve (elbow)
Ulnar nerve transposition at elbow - may include exploration, decompression and/or neurolysis
Decompression of posterior tibial or common peroneal nerve
Excision of Morton’s or subcutaneous neuroma, glomus or small cutaneous nerve tumour
major - (mixed sensory and motor nerve, or pure motor nerve)
major – (mixed sensory and motor nerve, or pure motor nerve)
major - (mixed sensory and motor nerve, or pure motor nerve)
Implantation of electrode for peripheral nerve stimulation
Implantation or revision of stimulation pack or leads, (peripheral nerve, brain)

referenced_codes.context: add 40% to basic fee for neurolysis, nerve tumour excision, nerve suture, nerve transfer, or nerve graft when using operating microscope
add 30% to basic fee for a repeat peripheral nerve procedure, or when acute nerve injury repair by suture, transfer or graft is delayed for more than 4 weeks
add 40% to N286 or N295 for implantation of neuroma into bone or muscle
add 102.45 for each additional cable, to N288
